title: Clear noon, slow city driving with 10 braking events
caption: A slow-moving car on a city street with palm trees and a billboard.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.6 m/s). There are 10 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because it is approaching an intersection with a red traffic light. It is also braking frequently due to the presence of other vehicles on the road.
